title: Jonas Vingegaard Wasting No Time in Accelerated Tour de France Rebuild: ‘He’s Training, He’s Confident’
content:
Two-time Tour de France champion already back on the bike and ironing out the wrinkles ahead of a 2025 showdown with Tadej Pogačar.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Wasting No Time in Accelerated Tour de France Rebuild: ‘He’s Training, He’s Confident’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
